me.adaptive.arp.api

Interface IDeviceOrientationListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAdaptiveRP, IBaseListener

    public interface IDeviceOrientationListener
extends IBaseListener
    Interface for handling device orientation change events.
    Since:
    v2.0.5

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IDeviceOrientationListener.Error
      Error conditions rotating device.
      static class  IDeviceOrientationListener.Warning
      Warning conditions rotating device.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface me.adaptive.arp.api.IAdaptiveRP

        IAdaptiveRP.Group

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(IDeviceOrientationListener.Error error)
      Although extremely unlikely, this event will be fired if something beyond the control of the platform impedes the rotation of the device.
      void onResult(RotationEvent event)
      Event fired with the successful start and finish of a rotation.
      void onWarning(RotationEvent event, IDeviceOrientationListener.Warning warning)
      Event fired with a warning when the rotation is aborted.

      • Methods inherited from interface me.adaptive.arp.api.IAdaptiveRP

        getAPIGroup, getAPIVersion

    • Method Detail

      • onResult

        void onResult(RotationEvent event)
        Event fired with the successful start and finish of a rotation.
        Parameters:
        event - RotationEvent containing origin, destination and state of the event.
        Since:
        v2.0.5

      • onWarning

        void onWarning(RotationEvent event,
               IDeviceOrientationListener.Warning warning)
        Event fired with a warning when the rotation is aborted. In specific, this event may be fired if the devices vetoes the rotation before rotation is completed.
        Parameters:
        event - RotationEvent containing origin, destination and state of the event.
        warning - Type of condition that aborted rotation execution.
        Since:
        v2.0.5

      • onError

        void onError(IDeviceOrientationListener.Error error)
        Although extremely unlikely, this event will be fired if something beyond the control of the platform impedes the rotation of the device.
        Parameters:
        error - The error condition... generally unknown as it is unexpected!
        Since:
        v2.0.5
